entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
